CURRICULUM VITAE
LUONG VU THANH HIEU
PERSONAL DETAILS
Full Name :
Lương Vũ Thanh Hiếu
Job Titles:
Project Manager
DOB:
February 1st 1988
Place of Birth :
Ha Noi, Vietnam
Gender : 
Male
Marital Status :
Single
Home Address : 
2/66 Ngu Nhac street,  Hoang Mai dist, Ha Noi, Viet Nam
Mobile : 
(+84) 918322924
Email :
Hieulvt128@gmail.com 
SUMMARY INFORMATION

Over 2 years of experience in leading the team and project management.

I have been working based on Agile/Scrum methodology, having technical background also.

Proficient in the use of language (PHP, SQL, HTML, CSS, Javascript).

I can use CSS3/HTML5 and have experience in use css framework as Boostrap.

Good in Javascript programming, I have worked with some libraries as Jquery, Angularjs. Having a knowledge about Nodejs.

Have strong experience in using PHP, understanding about MVC and OOP programming and can use PHP framework as Codeigniter,
Laravel, CakePHP framework. 

Have a good knowledge about MySQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL.

I have worked with SVN, Git.

Good teamwork, friendly, flexible and responsible in work.

Working under high pressure.

Job Title: Software Engineer, Team Leader, Project Manager
Job Description: 
Page 1 of 5
- Responsible for the development of software applications by participating in the definition, coding, testing, fixing bug
and other technical aspects of software projects; 
- Working with customers, manager and team members.
